Paragraph: 44,45 It was realized that by switching the spacer between the IDT and NT units , the processability , backbone planarity , charge carrier mobility and film morphology can be optimized.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| IDT (Interdigitated Transistor) units |
| NT (Nanotube) units |
| spacer material between IDT and NT units |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| spacer material between IDT units and NT units |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 44,45 It was realized that by switching the spacer between the IDT and NT units , the processability , backbone planarity , charge carrier mobility and film morphology can be optimized.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| processability |
| backbone planarity |
| charge carrier mobility |
| film morphology |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| processability |
| backbone planarity |
| charge carrier mobility |

These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be clearly identified as material properties. "Film morphology" is a property that refers to the shape and structure of a material or film, so it is valid as well.

Note: "backbone planarity" could be considered a property of a molecule or polymer chain rather than a material property, so it was removed from the list.
